en.title: **BSc** in Information Technology
en.text: During my BSc at Jahangirnagar University, I developed strong foundations in data structures, object-oriented programming, development, machine learning, and artificial intelligence.

es.title: **Licenciatura** en Tecnología de la Información
es.text: Durante mi licenciatura en la Universidad de Jahangirnagar, desarrollé una sólida base en estructuras de datos, programación orientada a objetos, desarrollo, aprendizaje automático e inteligencia artificial.

fr.title: **Licence** en Technologie de l'Information
fr.text: Pendant ma licence à l'Université de Jahangirnagar, j'ai développé de solides bases en structures de données, programmation orientée objet, développement, apprentissage automatique et intelligence artificielle.

ko.title: 정보 기술에 대한 **학사**
ko.text: 자한기르나가르 대학교에서의 학사 과정 동안, 데이터 구조, 객체 지향 프로그래밍, 개발, 머신러닝 및 인공지능에 대한 강력한 기초를 개발했습니다.

en.title: **HSC** in Science
en.info: Birshreshtha Munshi Abdur Rouf Public College
en.text: Pursued my HSC in Science at Birshreshtha Munshi Abdur Rouf Public College, building a strong foundation in the sciences.

es.title: **Educación Secundaria** en Ciencias
es.info: Colegio Público Birshreshtha Munshi Abdur Rouf
es.text: Pursuí mi HSC en Ciencias en el Colegio Público Birshreshtha Munshi Abdur Rouf, construyendo una fuerte base en las ciencias.

fr.title: **Études Secondaires** en Sciences
fr.info: Collège Public Birshreshtha Munshi Abdur Rouf
fr.text: J'ai poursuivi mon HSC en Sciences au Collège Public Birshreshtha Munshi Abdur Rouf, construisant une solide base en sciences.

ko.title: **과학**에서의 고등학교 졸업
ko.text: Birshreshtha Munshi Abdur Rouf 공립대학에서 과학에서 HSC를 추구하여 과학에 대한 강력한 기초를 쌓았습니다.

en.title: **SSC** in Science
en.text: Completed my SSC in Science from Pabna Zilla School, where I laid the groundwork for my scientific education.

es.title: **Educación Secundaria** en Ciencias
es.text: Completé mi SSC en Ciencias en la Escuela Zilla de Pabna, donde senté las bases para mi educación científica.

fr.title: **Études Secondaires Second Cycle** en Sciences
fr.text: J'ai terminé mon SSC en Sciences à l'École Zilla de Pabna, où j'ai posé les bases de mon éducation scientifique.

ko.title: **과학**에서의 고등학교 졸업
ko.text: 파브나 질라 학교에서 과학에서 SSC를 완료하여 과학 교육의 기초를 마련했습니다.
